CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 10-13 One promising approach toward broadening the absorption of the solar spectrum is to develop random terpolymers based on the copolymerization of two different electron - rich units and one electron - deficient unit 14-16 or one electron - rich unit and two different electron - deficient units.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. Terpolymers
2. Electron-rich units
3. Electron-deficient units

These are the materials that are being discussed in the paragraph as potential candidates for broadening the absorption of the solar spectrum.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure! Here are the entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

1. Terpolymers

These are the materials that are being discussed in the paragraph as potential candidates for broadening the absorption of the solar spectrum.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Terpolymers |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 10-13 One promising approach toward broadening the absorption of the solar spectrum is to develop random terpolymers based on the copolymerization of two different electron - rich units and one electron - deficient unit 14-16 or one electron - rich unit and two different electron - deficient units.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. Electron - rich units
2. Electron - deficient units
3. Random terpolymers
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure! Here are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to Material Properties:

1. Electron - rich units
2. Electron - deficient units

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer directly to Material Properties. The other entities (e.g. "one promising approach", "develop", "broadening the absorption of the solar spectrum") are not Material Properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Electron - rich units |
| Electron - deficient units |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 10-13 One promising approach toward broadening the absorption of the solar spectrum is to develop random terpolymers based on the copolymerization of two different electron - rich units and one electron - deficient unit 14-16 or one electron - rich unit and two different electron - deficient units.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Value" entities:

1. Electron - rich units: This refers to the units in the terpolymer that have a high concentration of electrons, which can absorb light more efficiently.
2. Electron - deficient units: This refers to the units in the terpolymer that have a low concentration of electrons, which can also absorb light more efficiently.
3. Absorption of the solar spectrum: This refers to the ability of the terpolymer to absorb light across a range of wavelengths, including the solar spectrum.

These entities are mentioned in the paragraph as properties of the terpolymer that can be manipulated to broaden its absorption of the solar spectrum.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the relevant entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. Electron - rich units: This refers to the units in the terpolymer that have a high concentration of electrons, which can absorb light more efficiently. The value of this property is related to the material's ability to absorb light.
2. Electron - deficient units: This refers to the units in the terpolymer that have a low concentration of electrons, which can also absorb light more efficiently. The value of this property is related to the material's ability to absorb light.

These two entities are the only ones that refer directly to the value of material properties in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities related to the value of material properties in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Electron-rich units |
| Electron-deficient units |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
